definitions.definition: (usually of large numbers of people during a violent event) to steal from shops and houses:
examples: During the riot shops were looted and cars damaged or set on fire.

definitions.definition: to steal something from a place or person:
examples: Burglars looted cash and mobiles from a shop in Tagore Town.

definitions.definition: money and valuable objects that have been stolen, especially by an army from a defeated enemy or by thieves
